author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Fix some bugs and make the scripts workable for calibrating HCAL with Run3 data and MC

#### PR validation:

Tested against Run3 data and MC

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: RUn3-alca230X Fix some bugs and make the scripts workable for calibrating HCAL with Run3 data and MC
